subject: Re: Order #SSN5515 confirmed

conversations.body_text:
Hello?

Peter Bernhard <peter.bernhard.leipzig@gmail.com> schrieb am Mo., 12. Jan.
2026, 12:45:

> Hello,
>
> why aren't the Pedals shipped yet? Handbrake and shifter arrived but the
> SF Express link to the VAM Motors does not work.
>
> Greets Peter
>
> Am Di., 30. Dez. 2025 um 00:54 Uhr schrieb SIMSONN

Hi Peter Bernhard,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.     Additionally, the VAM motor has been shipped. Below is the tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209199066
